verses.text:
Jesus thou art coming,
Coming as a King,
Glorious in thy beauty,
Joy and peace to bring;
Coming to thy temple,
Coming to thy throne,
Coming to thy people,
Coming to thine own.

Jesus thou art coming,
Coming from above,
In thy Father's glory,
In thy Father's love;
Coming to thy chosen,
Coming to thy bride,
Coming to thy faithful,
Coming to thy side.

Jesus thou art coming,
Coming very soon,
Coming in thy promise,
Coming in thy boon;
Coming to thy waiting,
Coming to thy prayer,
Coming to thy longing,
Coming to thy care.

Jesus thou art coming,
Coming to remain,
Coming to thy kingdom,
Coming to thy reign;
Coming to thy glory,
Coming to thy rest,
Coming to thy dwelling,
Coming to thy breast.
